about_the_game:
Embark on a journey with Hoshi, a fallen star determined to ascend back to the heavens. Aurora Heights is a precision platformer that will test your skills as you jump, climb, and dash through intricate and mysterious landscapes where other stars have failed. Unlock new movement abilities, collect keys, discover secrets, and explore a world filled with wonders and challenges.

Game Features

  • Ascend the Challenging Aurora Heights - Guide Hoshi through increasingly difficult terrains— the higher you climb, the tougher it gets

  • Master new skills like Nova Dash, Star Pulse, Rolling Nova, Overdrive, and more to reach new heights and hidden areas.

  • Assist Fellow Fallen Stars - Meet other stars along your journey. Help them, and they might return the favor, unlocking new paths and secrets.

  • Explore and Collect - Find keys to unlock new regions and advance further up Aurora Heights.

  • Pure Platforming Experience - No combat—focus entirely on exploration and precision platforming.

  • Embrace the Journey, Even in Setbacks - Don't fear falling; it might lead you to undiscovered areas and intriguing characters.

  • Unveil the Mystery - Try to discover why other stars couldn't reach the summit of Aurora Heights.

name: Aurora Heights
short_description: Aurora Heights is a combat-free, precision platformer, sprinked with metroidvania. Help Hoshi, a fallen star, ascend back to the heavens. Jump, climb, and dash to reach the top. Unlock new abilities, collect keys, discover secrets, and explore mysterious landscapes where other stars have failed.
